heroLayout.subText: Optimize your business with our revolutionary purchasing management and order management system! Streamline, automate and simplify your business process for maximum productivity and profitability.

step1.bodyText: Establish collaborations with the companies you already collaborate with today and then put the system into use together. This step will strengthen your collaborations and optimize your business.
step1.title: Partnership

step2.bodyText: By integrating existing products into the system, you create efficiency and open opportunities for growth. It provides competitive advantages and improved customer service.
step2.title: Add and edit products

step3.bodyText: Get started registering, packing and managing orders smoothly in the system. This will streamline your order process and increase your productivity.
step3.title: Order processing

step4.bodyText: Simply tick off the delivered orders in the system when they have been sent. This gives you a better overview of delivery status and streamlines your inventory management.
step4.title: Delivery

screenshotBox.listText3: With Tieraid work orders, you get full control of all ongoing and executed orders
screenshotBox.title: Smoother order handling with Tieraid

productPage.productErrorMessage: Sorry we could not provide any product information at the moment, please try again later.

notification.failedAddDescription: Please try again in a short while.
notification.failedRemovedDescription: Please try again in a short while.
notification.lowStockDescription: When a product reaches a low threshold, an email will be sent from the supplier to the recipients listed below. You can add one or more email recipients. If no recipients are added and you have subscribed to notifications, the email will be sent to your company email address (the one set under Company settings).
notification.lowStockSettingNotEnabledDescription: It looks like the setting for low stock notifications is not enabled.
notification.orderDescription: When a user creates an order with one of your suppliers, a copy of the email confirmation will also be sent to the recipients listed below. You can add one or more email recipients. If no recipients are added and you have subscribed to notifications, the email will be sent to your company email address (the one set under Company settings).
notification.title: Notifications

statistic.description: Here you can get a summary on how many products that are ordered (default period is set to current month)

statistic.title: Order statistic

products.description: Here are all available products that can be seen by your partner

products.quantityDescription: There are a total of {{ current }} of which {{ reserved }} are planned for delivery so the availability is {{ available }} pcs.
products.title: Available products
